txt.en: The Blogmal Orcs are building siege equipment in their camp outside of the once-great city of Fornost.
The siege weapon parts are being assembled in the Orc camp of northern Fornost.\n\nYou should destroy the siege weapon parts being assembled by the Blogmal Orcs.
'You have thwarted Angmar's plans, [placeholder]! It will take them much longer now to amass the siege weapons they need. For a time, at least, Trestlebridge and Bree-land should be safe.'
Gareth Copp is at the camp of the Free Peoples in the southern reaches of Fornost.\n\nYou should return to Gareth Copp and let him know that you have destroyed a number of siege-parts.
'If the Blogmal are permitted to complete those siege weapons, Eriador will not survive the ravages of Angmar. You must destroy them!'
Tell Gareth Copp of the siege-weapons you destroyed
'Angmar will question the wisdom of attacking us again!'
The Blogmal Orcs are building siege equipment in their camp outside of the once-great city of Fornost.\n\nWhatever their purpose, it cannot be good. You should destroy the siege equipment.
'Trestlebridge is safe for now! Well done, [placeholder]!'
